scripts.getTheme: mkdir -p dist/fonts && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kristopolous/BOOTSTRA.386/master/v2.3.1/bootstrap/css/bootstrap.css -O dist/bootstrap.css && wget https://github.com/kristopolous/BOOTSTRA.386/raw/master/v2.3.1/bootstrap/css/fonts/Fixedsys500c.woff -O dist/fonts/Fixedsys500c.woff
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run bundle:production && npm run getTheme && npm run copy
scripts.deploy: if [ "$TRAVIS_BRANCH" -eq "develop" ]; then npm run delpoy:develop; elif [ $TRAVIS_BRANCH == "master" ]; then npm run delpoy:master; else npm run deploy:pull-request; fi
